title: Having trouble identifying this font...
content:
It would be appreciated if someone could inform me as to what this font is...

Thanks in advance

Kenneth

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016121729im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a1_6699.jpg)
author: jacobson223

comments.content:
Would help if I had some idea as to the source of the image.  
As for the numbers, they look like something from an old style cash register printed receipt. Similar numbers are digitized by Hoefler & Frere Jones as [Revenue](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016121729/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_inside.php?wipID=12&productLineID=100018)  
Don
